p: Possible explanation of these phenomena could be something, which assures ability to prompt response to the virus in younger people independently from the novelty of the virus itself. In some words, it would seems to be that younger people are almost already sensitized to the antigens of the virus without a previous contact with that specific serotype of coronavirus. In fact, they become infected and eventually develop a mild to moderate respiratory disease, but the immune system counteracts the virus and limit lung injury that is on its way to restitution ad integrum.
